summary: This config is mainly designed for low-end computers. It will boost your framerate while maintaining a decent visual experience.
descriptionHtml:
[b]DESCRIPTION[/b]

This config is designed to boost your framerate while maintaining a decent visual experience.

It mainly targets people with low-end computers who are not able to play the game smoothly at lowest settings.

What it basically does is disabling shadows, reflections, clouds and grass, decreasing LOD and view distance, lowering texture resolution and implementing plenty of other tweaks to improve overall performance and memory usage.

Despite the fact that most settings in this CFG are already set to the lowest possible value, feel free to tweak any of them to your liking with the help of the provided documentation.

If you have any suggestions, questions or feedback, please post on the forums.


Enjoy!
- Genesis


WARNING

I don't recommend tweaking settings in this config until they are not documented.
This config is also not made for people willing to play the game at medium settings and higher. You should rather edit your own config according to the documentation provided in this one.
You might also experience more crashes to desktop when using this config, please ensure your CTDs are actually caused by this config if you are using other mods before asking for help.



[b]CREDITS[/b]

- TysonEX (world map fix)
- MOTOSXORPIO (performance tip)
- nefesta89 (invisibility fix)
author: GenesisFR

files.name: Genesis Skyrim Performance Config v1_0_2
files.changelogHtml: [FIX] shadow resolution was causing a huge slowdown

files.name: Genesis Skyrim Performance Config v1_0_3
files.changelogHtml: [FIX] viewing the world map was crashing the game (TysonEX)

files.name: Genesis Skyrim Performance Config v1_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
[ADD] documentation about some settings
[ADD] FAQ and CREDITS sections in the readme file
[ADD] improved framerate up to 8% (MOTOSXORPIO)
[CHANGE] slightly increased view distance for objects and NPCs
[CHANGE] restored uGridsToLoad to its default value

files.name: Genesis Skyrim Performance Config v1_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
[ADD] extended mod description
[FIX] invisibility effects were not working (nefesta89)

files.name: Genesis Skyrim Performance Config v1_1_2
files.changelogHtml:
[CHANGE] reenabled autosave on fast-travel, pause and rest
[CHANGE] reenabled water displacements
[CHANGE] texture quality set to \"Low\"
